Vi på Brixo söker just nu en Backend-utvecklare

Som Backend-utvecklare hos oss kommer du få möjlighet att arbeta med vidareutveckling och underhåll av vår egenbyggda IT-plattform. Du kommer att tillhöra ett litet sammansvetsat team av IT-utvecklare som gärna hjälper varandra. Du kommer att arbeta med både nya samt pågående utvecklingsprojekt och kommer själv utveckla och programmera delar av plattformen. För att du ska få en grundläggande förståelse och kunskap för alla delar av verksamheten kommer du i början av anställningen få en introduktion av samtliga verksamhetsområden hos oss.

Vi tror att vår nya Backend-utvecklare har..

- 5+ års erfarenhet av att arbeta som utvecklare inom Java (Version Java 8+) i kombination med Spring/Spring Boot

- 3+ års erfarenhet av att bygga och hantera databaser

- Kunskaper inom REST API:er, Docker, PostgreSQL, Git, CI/CD, Junit

- Erfarenhet av att arbeta med mikrotjänstarkitektur

- Erfarenhet av att skriva teknisk dokumentation

- Har en relevant kandidatexamen

- God förmåga att kommunicera på engelska och svenska

Det är ett plus om du...

- Är certifierad eller har erfarenhet av att arbeta med molnlösningsarkitektur, helst
AWS

- Har erfarenhet av utveckling av bankrelaterade eller andra finansiella applikationer

- Har erfarenhet av utveckling inom PHP och MySQL

Varför Brixo?
Brixo erbjuder en stimulerande arbetsplats som präglas av entreprenörskap och utveckling. Du kommer att arbeta med kompetenta och drivna kollegor och det kommer att finnas goda utvecklingsmöjligheter med ett successivt ökat ansvar i takt med att vi växer. Arbetsuppgifterna vi erbjuder har ofta hög prioritet samt är strategiskt viktiga och därför utmanande men också varierande. Oavsett vilken uppgift du arbetar med så finns det alltid duktiga kollegor som gärna hjälper till.

Om Brixo
Brixo strävar efter att förenkla och förbättra marknaden för finansieringstjänster genom att med innovativa kreditprodukter och noggranna kreditprövningar tillgängliggöra krediter för en bredare allmänhet. Brixo har idag fyra olika kreditvarumärken som erbjuder kontokrediter på upp till 50 000 kronor. Bolaget grundades 2014 och är ett konsumentkreditinstitut som står under Finansinspektionens tillsyn. Bolaget har idag 23 anställda och en total utlåningsportfölj om cirka 350 miljoner kronor.

Här kan du läsa mer:
https://brixo.se/

Har du några frågor gällande rollen eller rekryteringsprocessen, hör av dig till Cim Johansson på cim.johansson@brixo.se

Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Frontend-utvecklare sökes till snabbväxande fintechbolag!
description:
Brixo är ett svenskt fintechbolag som utmanar det traditionella banksystemet genom att erbjuda digitala kontokrediter till privatpersoner i Sverige. Vi är ett snabbväxande konsumentkreditinstitut med stora ambitioner och som vill utmana de etablerade kreditinstituten och bankerna. Hos oss får du möjlighet att påverka, vara en del av och bidra till hur vi bit för bit bygger en verksamhet som utmanar våra konkurrenter. Brixo växer, och nu har du möjlighet att få växa med oss!

Är du en Frontend-utvecklare som brinner för systemutveckling och problemlösning, och som gillar att utmanas och utvecklas? Keep on reading!

Som Frontend-utvecklare hos oss kommer du bland annat att arbeta med vidareutveckling och underhåll av vår egenbyggda IT-plattform tillsammans med ett härligt team av IT-utvecklare. För närvarande migrerar vi våra produktwebbplatser till WordPress med specialbyggt tema. Som Frontend-utvecklare kommer du att bygga olika plugins från grunden, och därigenom utveckla nuvarande samt ny funktionalitet genom plugins. Du kommer också bidra till våra ständiga förbättringar av UI- och UX-design och skapandet av nya funktioner. Samtidigt migrerar vi just nu våra backend-system till en mikrotjänstarkitektur. Med din erfarenhet och kompetens så kommer du att utveckla vår frontend-applikation som används internt av våra kredithandläggare för att effektivt bearbeta kreditansökningar.

Vi tror att vår nya Frontend-utvecklare har..

- Minst 4 års erfarenhet inom frontend

- Erfarenhet av React

- Erfarenhet av JavaScript/TypeScript, jQuery

- Erfarenhet av WordPress Theme och plugin-utveckling

- Erfarenhet av PHP

- Erfarenhet av HTML5, CSS3, SASS

- God förmåga att kommunicera på svenska och engelska

Det är ett plus om du även har..

- Erfarenhet av Git

- Erfarenhet av att använda Jira + Confluence

- Erfarenhet av Amazon Web Services (AWS)

Varför Brixo?
Brixo erbjuder en stimulerande arbetsplats som präglas av entreprenörskap och utveckling. Du kommer att arbeta med kompetenta och drivna kollegor och det kommer att finnas goda utvecklingsmöjligheter med ett successivt ökat ansvar i takt med att vi växer. Arbetsuppgifterna vi erbjuder har ofta hög prioritet samt är strategiskt viktiga och därför utmanande men också varierande. Oavsett vilken uppgift du arbetar med så finns det alltid duktiga kollegor runt omkring dig som gärna hjälper till!

Om Brixo
Brixo strävar efter att förenkla och förbättra marknaden för finansieringstjänster genom att med innovativa kreditprodukter och noggranna kreditprövningar tillgängliggöra krediter för en bredare allmänhet. Brixo har idag fyra olika kreditvarumärken som erbjuder kontokrediter på upp till 50 000 kronor. Bolaget grundades 2014 och är ett konsumentkreditinstitut som står under Finansinspektionens tillsyn. Bolaget har idag 23 anställda och en total utlåningsportfölj om cirka 350 miljoner kronor.

title: Frontend Developer - React/React Native
description:
About the role
We’re now looking for experienced Frontend Developers, who think it's fun to create and maintain useful applications and services using modern tooling, which all contribute to a great user experience both for internal and external users. At us you’ll be able to shape the future of products that directly affect millions of users all over Europe. Below you find some nice-to-have information on how it is to be a Frontend Developer:

The Shopping team's main objective is to ensure customers get the most out of their shopping experience, both through the App and also through the web. They work collaboratively and closely together as a team to make sure they're constantly improving the functionality and stability of the products while increasing transparency and always finding new ways to communicate with our customers.

The Box team is designing and implementing user-friendly interfaces for internal use as well as developing the human-machine interface for the box product. Working closely with product stakeholders, they help to bring new features and continuous improvements to the box product and its internal systems.

About you
We’re hiring for multiple teams and we are looking for both senior engineers or you with a couple of years of experience looking for your next move - If you are a skilled problem solver who loves coding and making complex things work, then this is the place for you! We value individuals who are keen to learn, and your eagerness to develop your skill set will probably be your strongest asset when joining us. Beyond that we imagine that you have the following:

- At least 3 years of work experience as a Frontend Engineer in a modern tech environment

- Experience with JavaScript/TypeScript/React/React Native

- Good facilitation skills

- Proficient in English

- Comfortable making decisions

- Worked on building and maintaining large-scale production apps

- Experience working with Redux or other state management systems

- Problem-solving skills and ability to think about sustainable and long-term solutions

- Experience in working with an agile development methodology

In order for you to thrive you need to like the fast-paced environment and not be afraid to get shit under your fingernails. Let's be honest, we are in an incredibly exciting phase where much is uncertain and not decided. In this business, you need to have thick skin to get by, like changes and not be afraid to set new structures, set processes, and create new WoW.

Diversity and inclusion are very important for us, and we also know that we don’t know everything. So if your passion is making great user experiences, and you have a strong willingness to learn, but don’t tick all the boxes above - don't hesitate to apply no matter who you are and let us know how you can contribute to our journey.

This recruitment process consists of personality tests via Alva Labs and background checks as a review of previous public criminal records. The result is public information that is handled confidentially. This is mandatory for all recruitment processes in Sweden.

title: Backend Developer - Java
description:
About the role
You’ll be part of an agile autonomous team working on extending and refining our core systems. Our teams solve a wide array of complex problems, below are some examples.

Capacity management - We believe in quick, exact, and efficient delivery. To know when we can deliver a specific parcel, or how to maximize locker compartment utilization, we continuously adapt and gain knowledge about of the current parcel delivery capacity in our locker network and how it changes over time. We use machine learning to model consumer pick-up behavior and forecast future parcel volumes from merchants.

Driver route optimization - Driving is at the core of what we do. Well-planned routes are essential for driver happiness, consumer satisfaction, and our ability to offer sustainable deliveries.

Locker fleet management - Our lockers are equipped with a tailor-made computer, a 4G modem with an intuitive interface. With a large growing fleet of lockers in multiple countries, we solve problems such as performing safe and secure software roll-outs, inventory management, and detection of malfunctioning hardware.

About you
We’re hiring for multiple teams and we are looking for both senior engineers or you with a couple of years of experience looking for your next move - If you are a skilled problem solver who loves coding and making complex things work, then this is the place for you! At Budbee we value individuals who are keen to learn, and your eagerness to develop your skill set will probably be your strongest asset when joining us. Beyond that we imagine that you have the following:

- At least 3 years of work experience as a Backend Engineer in a modern tech environment

- Working with JVM-based languages such as Java/Kotlin/Scala

- Ability to think creatively to solve problems

- Good facilitation skills

- Proficient in English

- Comfortable making decisions around technical system design and architecture

- Experience with automated testing and code reviews

- Experience with event-driven/event-oriented architecture & data models

- Experience with Terraform & Kubernetes

- Experience with IoT

- Deploying and managing auto-scaling services

In order for you to thrive you need to like the fast-paced environment and not be afraid to get shit under your fingernails. Let's be honest, we are in an incredibly exciting phase where much is uncertain and not decided. In this business, you need to have thick skin to get by, like changes and not be afraid to set new structures, set processes, and create new WoW.

Diversity and inclusion are very important for us, and we also know that we don’t know everything. So if your passion is problem-solving, and coding and you have a strong willingness to learn, but don’t tick all the boxes above - don't hesitate to apply no matter who you are and let us know how you can contribute to our journey.

This recruitment process consists of personality tests via Alva Labs and background checks as a review of previous public criminal records. The result is public information that is handled confidentially. This is mandatory for all recruitment processes in Sweden.

title: Salesforce Developer
description: Can you develop in Salesforce and also have full stack skills? Do you want a company that has full speed ahead and likes new technology? Welcome to Sweden's leading CRM consultant as your next career step!Our Salesforce area is advancing by leaps and bounds and we need you who value wonderful colleagues, challenging customer projects and a developing workplace. We have R&D days, solutions at the absolute forefront and a nice forward-leaning gang that wants more. We believe you are an experienced Salesforce developer who wants to take the next step.QualificationsCertifications / Development Experience in Salesforce.Experience of database management / programming in MS SQL Server.Good knowledge and skills in C # ,. NET, JavaScript (or equivalent); preferably with experience of modern frameworks such as Vue and React.Who we think you areYou are fearless and a problem solver who constantly wants to develop.You are social and communicative.You like to work in groups and have developing discussions with both employees and customers.TimelineThe first weeks are spent in the introductory program where, in addition to meeting different people at your new workplace, you are presented with our vision, get to meet a founder, go through our project method, get a feel for what we solve with our customers, etc. You get also an "introbuddy" - a more senior colleague who can answer all kinds of questions you have when you start. The goal is for you to get out and start our projects as soon as possible, and we will already have you planned in some of our projects.During the first and second month, you are involved in 1-2 projects and enter the project group and the working method. After three to four months, you have 3-4 customers (and projects) you work in and you learn a lot. The projects are carried out mixed from our office and out to the customer (post-corona). After about six months, you are fully incorporated in your role and no longer feel like new with us :-).About ReleyeReleye is a strategy and IT company that Automates, Digitizes and Transforms customer processes, and ensures that they are adapted to the new digital world. Together with our customers, we develop proactive customer experiences.Our office is located at Odenplan in central Stockholm. Looking forward to meeting you!

title: Dynamics CRM
description: We offer a challenging, developing workplace with a competent and social team. We run our own projects in the field of CRM and Business Intelligence with sales, marketing and customer service organizations as the main user groups. You will work in and be an important part of our projects. A large portion of the projects are carried out internally in our office. We are located in central Stockholm. We place great emphasis on your personal characteristics. You are a social person who enjoys working in a team and who can bring creative discussions with both employees and customers. You are a problem solver and driven by challenges. We're looking for a hungry and innovative developer in the Microsoft Dynamics CRM/365 platform. The position is for a senior level developer in and around the Microsoft Dynamics 365 (CE)  and Power Apps platform.The solutions and projects that you will be involved in are very user-oriented. You should have a genuine interest in building innovative solutions.Your SkillsMicrosoft Dynamics CRM developingC#ASP.NETJavaScriptJQueryMVCDatabase management / programming in MS SQL ServerPower AppsWelcome to apply!

title: Java Developer
description:
Do you want to help us unleash the secret to how happy employees create a happy business? We are an innovative, agile, and continuously growing modern tech company on a path to improving the work lives of millions around the world.

We develop workforce management solutions - software that makes scheduling and time reporting more smooth and more flexible for almost a million users worldwide!

We value passion, creativity, quality, and simplicity. You’ll be given the opportunity to make an impact and directly contribute to our success, bring new ideas, and have full ownership of your area.

Our global team, of more than 35 nationalities, have fun together, whether it is during a typical Swedish Fika, a workshop, going for a run with a colleague, or spending time together during the annual company Goal trip, team kickoffs, or after-work socials. We have built a collaborative and friendly atmosphere here at Quinyx and are committed to sharing knowledge and supporting one another!

Are you curious and ready to take the first steps on an awesome journey and make magic happen with us? As a member of Quinyx, you will be part of an inclusive and diverse workplace where everyone is allowed to be themselves and thrive.

About the role

As a Java Developer, you will join a cross-functional distributed team of colleagues where you will contribute to the development of a modern, cloud-first system using a modern technology stack. You will be responsible for a specific problem domain within the broader Quinyx system while being expected to take ownership of the system as a whole. You will continuously cooperate with other backend or frontend developers, QA engineers, product owners, and designers across the R&D team In a senior role, you will be expected to take an active part in the platform and its technologies, as well as communicate the considerations and lessons you learn to other members of the team.

We are building one of the most successful workforce management systems globally - our customers are, for example, DHL, Burger King, Espresso House, SATS, The Vasa Museum, and a lot of others (https://www.quinyx.com/customers).

What you’ll be doing

- As a Java developer at Quinyx, you’ll be building the backbone of the most successful multi-tenant workforce management system in the world.

- Develop Quinyx towards an even more secure, more event-driven, and modern platform.

- Participate in and lead discussions around technical subjects in the broader R&D team.

- Participating in technical interviews during our hiring process to help us spot new talents.

What you’ll bring to the team

- Development skills in Java, with a focus on microservices using the Spring Boot framework.

- Soft skills as a teacher and mentor for more junior colleagues.

- Five or more years of software development experience.

- A habit of working with tests as a part of your development workflow.

- An ability to support and enhance advanced functionality in the platform, such as authentication, authorization, event-driven flows, service decomposition, etc.

- Experience from previous projects and new ideas on how to improve technologies at Quinyx.

What’s in it for you?

We promote and encourage a healthy lifestyle with flexible work hours and the latest tools, enhanced vacation allowance, wellness, home office, professional development contributions, virtual yoga classes, and last but not least, you will have the chance to participate in our well-known yearly ping-pong tournament!

Want to join Quinyx?

At Quinyx, we provide equal employment opportunities and strive for an inclusive, diverse, value-driven culture. All applications will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, disability, or veteran status.

Happy Workforce, Happy Business!

title: ASIC and FPGA Verification - Telecom
description:
At Capgemini Engineering, you are part of something bigger. Our close cooperation with other entities within the Capgemini Group will give you the opportunity to explore endless possibilities. We have offices all over the world, and the Capgemini family consists of more than 340 000 colleagues globally. 

Not all heroes wear a cape – our employees help to make the world a better place. We do this by working in projects that save lives. Our consultants develop next generation 5G, ensure the quality of software apps for medical devices, develop and test driver assistance functions in cars and so much more. Our clients are big international companies, as well as local public organizations and Nordic startups. Join us and get the future you want!

In Telecommunications we are generating new revenue streams in a connected world​. Our experts are involved in Virtual Network Foundation with transformation to Hyper-Scaler – Virtualized Networks and cloud. We are also experts in network and compute product and service development. 5G is the fifth generation of cellular networks and is here right now, so we are working with 5G Market Adoption where we develop software frameworks solutions, communications system integration, and intelligent 5G & edge. 

Working for Capgemini Engineering is more than just a job. We have several activities during the year where we meet to share knowledge or just to have fun. 

Your role

 - Define test plan, verification strategy and specifications for IP/Subsystem/SOC Design’s.
 - Implement testbench infrastructure and create testcases and sequences in UVM-SV(System-Verilog).
 - Implement and work on to close Functional verification using coverage driven methodology.
 - Make testbench architecture decisions based on Design features.


Your profile

 - Hands on experience in creating Test bench environment from functional requirements using UVM.
 - Solid understanding and experience in System Verilog and UVM methodology.
 - Hands on experience in Test planning, Score boarding, Modeling coverage and coverage closure.
 - Several years of real time experience in ASIC and FPGA Verification.
 - Familiar with any of the Industry standard protocols (ARM-AMBA, Ethernet, PCIe, DDR, SATA, SERDES, CPRI, I2C etc). 
 - Should be a team player and also have the ability to work independently. 


Nice to have:

 - Experience in C, C++, System-C.
 - Scripting in Perl/Tcl/Python.
 - Experience in GIT and Gerrit flow.
 - Knowledge in Formal Verification and Validation.
 - Working on different levels of ASIC Verification is a plus (IP/Subsystem/SOC Design’s).
 - Integrating 3rd party Verification IP’s.




Capgemini Engineering is an integral part of the Capgemini Group, a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided every day by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of 270,000 team members in nearly 50 countries. With its strong 50-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2020 global revenues of €16 billion.

Get the Future You Want | www.capgemini.com
